intro.title: An Invitational Framework for Indigenous Sovereignty and Planetary Healing
intro.paragraph1: This framework emerges as an invitational pathway for planetary transformation, positioning Indigenous peoples as sovereign leaders of regenerative governance systems guided by the wisdom of the Earth.
intro.paragraph2: Rooted in deep respect for Indigenous sovereignty and Traditional Ecological Knowledge, this framework centers Indigenous leadership, ecological wisdom, and long-term sustainability as the foundation for planetary healing.
